He made your city secure, he blessed your children among you. He keeps the peace at your borders, he puts the best bread on your tables. He launches his promises earthward– how swift and sure they come! He spreads snow like a white fleece, he scatters frost like ashes, He broadcasts hail like birdseed– who can survive his winter? Then he gives the command and it all melts; he breathes on winter–suddenly it"s spring! speaks words that work to Israel. He never did this to the other nations; they never heard such commands. Hallelujah!
